name: Cypress River Advisors

overview:
Cypress River Advisors is a cross-border strategic advisory firm. We specialize in market development, strategic partnering, technology licensing and advisory services for entrepreneurial companies seeking to pursue new business initiatives between the Asia Pacific, Americas, Europe and Australia.

We have an intimate understanding of the complexities inherent in cross-border transactions in the region. Our clients benefit from our teamâ€™s hands-on experience with establishing new businesses, exploring new channels, navigating through the regulatory frameworks and partnering with regional institutional and angel investors.   1. Telecommunications
  2. Entertainment and Media
  3. Technology
  4. Life Sciences
  5. Green Technology

Cypress River Advisors operates as an embedded member within our clientâ€™s strategic planning and deal execution teams. We provide our clients with an unbiased and real-time on-the-ground analysis of local market developments. We serve as a critical ingredient to timely strategic decision making. Cypress Riverâ€™s goal in any engagement is to pave the way for executive management. As our clients expand outside their primary markets, we act as a bridge to local partners and industry regulators to mitigate risk.
